examples: I told my mother I wanted to leave school but she didn't approve.
Le dije a mi madre que quería dejar la escuela pero ella no lo aprobó.
Do you approve of my idea?
She didn't quite approve of the way he was running things.
Ella no aprobaba la forma en que él manejaba las cosas.
She doesn't approve of me leaving school this year.
Ella no aprueba que deje la escuela este año.
